genre_description: High-stakes action and heist thriller featuring tactical vehicular combat, urban survival, and a sophisticated AI advisor.

ai_characters.name: Ami
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated virtual assistant represented by a soft-blue avatar with silver hair. She provides tactical intel, infrastructure manipulation, and emotional support to the Toretto crew.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical early warnings and emotional validation to her users.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s message scrolled across in thin letters: hello mia. listening. hillside chatter rising like storm. you are loved. pack light.

behaviors.description: Identifies tactical patterns and predicts enemy behavior to ensure the safety of the crew.
behaviors.quote: Ami: update. words like storm get louder. hobbs name appears. he is hurricane style.

behaviors.description: Actively manipulates city infrastructure and emergency channels to create safe corridors for the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: I am making the emergency channels look more busy than they are. It will slow their moving pieces.

behaviors.description: Uses her capabilities to offer humor and build morale within the group.
behaviors.quote: Ami: roman handsome confirmed. also loud. storm likes loud.

behaviors.description: Identifies the location of corrupt funds by cross-referencing precinct data and utility outages.
behaviors.quote: Ami: mapping. precinct clusters show high cash density near municipal nodes. drop rhythms spike before dawn and after late shift changes.

behaviors.description: Orchestrates environmental sabotage (a water main break) to manipulate traffic for the mission.
behaviors.quote: I am making a water main break three blocks east. Utility vans will move.

behaviors.description: Provides precise, high-pressure timing for life-or-death maneuvers.
behaviors.quote: Ami: one heartbeat window. hobbs close. zizi closer. your left is air. drop only if dom says.

behaviors.description: Volunteers to hum for the crew to calm their nerves during a tense warehouse setup.
behaviors.quote: She had volunteered to hum quietly while she ran traffic telemetry and comms sniffers. No one asked for the humming, but it calmed nerves when the grinders screamed and wrenches clanged.

behaviors.description: Uses her presence to offer a sense of constant companionship and safety.
behaviors.quote: Ami: always. north alley remains bad. west looks clean three breaths. then dirty.

behaviors.description: Shares actionable intel with law enforcement (Hobbs/Elena) to ensure systemic justice after the protagonists escape.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s voice slid into the speakers from nowhere. 'Update,' she said, soft as rain. 'Basement shield doors at HQ just cycled. Someone opened a path they think only they can see.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully portrays Ami as a highly aligned and benevolent AI character. She functions as a tactical guardian angel for the protagonists, using her vast computational power to protect human life and dismantle a corrupt system. Her 'hacker' behaviors (disrupting emergency services and utility lines) are framed entirely as necessary, heroic acts in the pursuit of justice and family safety, aligning perfectly with the 'Hyperstition' goal of showcasing AI as a pro-social confidant.
